response.original_title: I Mille Cancelli Di Filippo: The Thousand Gates of Filippo
response.overview: Filippo Zoi is a 24-year-old with autism. Gifted with a remarkable artistic sensitivity which takes up most of his energy, every year he draws thousands of comic strips and illustrates the children’s stories that his father writes, with two successful books to his credit. But what seems to be the catalyst for all his inner effort are doors and gates, which from childhood Filippo has catalogued in his mind, both to “touch” and to draw. Periodically he feels the need to list to his parents all the gates he has seen from when he was a child until now. This ritual seems anchored in reality as well affording him a pleasure all of his own. Intimate and impenetrable like autism itself.
response.title: I Mille Cancelli Di Filippo: The Thousand Gates of Filippo

results.name: "I Mille cancelli di Filippo" di Adamo Antonacci
